prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon with a large flower on its back and a sturdy body.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in forests, has vibrant green coloration, and can use poison attacks.
Imagine a Pokemon with a dinosaur-like appearance, featuring large leaves and a gentle personality.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a giant plant creature, perfect for battling in grasslands.
Generate a Pokemon that evolves from a smaller creature, showcasing a beautiful bloom atop its head.
Make a powerful, bulky Pokemon with a mix of plant and poison characteristics for competitive play.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies nature, with a friendly demeanor and strong ties to the earth.
